description: Order reactivation details. Includes information regarding the discontinue (e.g. discontinue user, discontinue reason, etc).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REACT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user that reactivated the order.

columns.name: REACT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the order was reactivated.

columns.name: REACT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reactivation reason category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REACT_DC_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the user that discontinued the order.

columns.name: REACT_DC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the order was discontinued.

columns.name: REACT_DC_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discontinue reason category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REACT_DC_ENC
columns.description: The patient encounter the order was discontinued in.

columns.name: REACT_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments entered when the order was reactivated.

columns.name: REACT_DC_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date specified when the order was discontinued.

columns.name: REACT_DC_END_TIME
columns.description: The end time specified when the order was discontinued.

columns.name: REACT_DC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the discontinue encounter. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: REACT_PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the owning pharmacy of the order when it was reactivated.
